name: stefanotorresi/thorr-persistence-doctrine
description: Thorr\Persistence data mapper adapters for Doctrine

suggest.zendframework/zend-modulemanager: required to load the library as a ZF2 module
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: required to create adapters via the DataMapperManager
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-orm-module: required to load AbstractEntity metadata into Doctrine ORM
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-mongo-odm-module: required to load AbstractEntity metadata into Doctrine Mongo ODM
